hom02

Class ConsoleTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • hom02.ConsoleTable

  • public class ConsoleTable
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates a basic table that can be output to the console.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String makeTable(int width, java.lang.String[][] array)
      Makes a table.
      static java.lang.String makeTable(java.lang.String title, int width, java.lang.String[][] array)
      Makes a table with a title.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • makeTable

        public static java.lang.String makeTable(java.lang.String title,
                                         int width,
                                         java.lang.String[][] array)
        Makes a table with a title.
        Parameters:
        title - String that will be displayed as the title
        width - The preferred width of the table output. May be slightly modified to ensure columns are spaced evenly
        array - Two dimensional String array that holds the data to be displayed in the table
        Returns:
        A formatted string that when output to the console will be a table of data

      • makeTable

        public static java.lang.String makeTable(int width,
                                         java.lang.String[][] array)
        Makes a table.
        Parameters:
        width - The preferred width of the table output. May be slightly modified to ensure columns are spaced evenly
        array - Two dimensional String array that holds the data to be displayed in the table
        Returns:
        A formatted string that when output to the console will be a table of data
